case_vignette: A 20-year-old woman is brought to the physician by her mother because she has been worried about her daughter's strange behavior for the past 2 years. She does not have any friends and spends most of her time alone in her room. She usually wears a long, black, hooded cloak. She is anxious at college because she is uncomfortable around other people, and her academic performance is poor. She collects rare crystals and says that they support her “sixth sense.” Mental status examination shows slow, hesitant speech, and she avoids eye contact.
question: Which  is the most likely diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been feeling really anxious at college, especially around other people, and I've been having trouble with my schoolwork because of this.
Have you had any previous episodes of anxiety or depression?
My mom has been worried about me for the past 2 years because of my strange behavior.
Has your mom noticed any changes in your mood or behavior recently?
Yes, she's noticed that I don't have any friends and I spend most of my time alone in my room.
Have you had any recent changes in your sleep patterns or appetite?
The case vignette provided does not specify any information about my sleep patterns or appetite, so I have no changes to report in these areas.
Have you had any recent changes in your academic performance or any other areas of your life?
Yes, my academic performance has been poor.
Have you had any recent changes in your stress levels or any other factors that may be contributing to your anxiety?
I'm uncomfortable around other people, which makes me anxious at college.
Have you had any recent changes in your social life or any other factors that may be contributing to your anxiety?
I don't have any friends and I usually keep to myself, spending a lot of time alone.
Have you had any recent changes in your family history or any other factors that may be contributing to your anxiety?
The case vignette does not provide any information about changes in my family history.
Final Diagnosis: Social Anxiety Disorder.
